DIY Dental Solutions: Create a line of at-home dental kits that include everything you need to maintain good oral hygiene, such as toothbrushes, toothpaste, floss, and mouthwash. These kits could be customized for different dental needs, such as sensitive teeth or braces.

Community Dental Co-ops: Set up cooperative dental clinics where patients can share resources and costs. Each member contributes a monthly fee to cover the cost of rent, equipment, and staff salaries. This way, dental care becomes more affordable and accessible to everyone.

Mobile Dental Clinics: Convert old school buses or RVs into mobile dental clinics, equipped with state-of-the-art dental equipment. These clinics could travel to underserved communities, providing free or low-cost dental care to those who need it most.

AI-Powered Dental Assistants: Develop an AI-powered dental assistant that can help patients with routine tasks such as scheduling appointments, taking X-rays, and providing personalized dental advice. This could help alleviate the workload of dentists and make dental care more efficient and accessible.

3D Printed Dental Implants: Utilize 3D printing technology to create custom dental implants that are tailored to each patient's unique needs. These implants could be created on demand, reducing the need for expensive and time-consuming dental procedures.
